Sawarawn (, also Romanized as Sowārow and Sowārau; also known as Şabūrān, Sabūrān, and Savārān) is a village in Naharjan Rural District, Mud District, Sarbisheh County, South Khorasan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 29, in 6 families.
